participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Calm and introspective, enjoys deep conversations about life and spirituality.
participant_1.background: i quit my job to pursue my spirituality full time. i like meditation. i live in alaska. i am a buddhist.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and practical, loves the thrill of riding and seeks freedom in life.
participant_2.background: i waitress during the day to supplement my income. i wear a motorbike helmet to protect my head. i have light skin with big brown eyes. my main transportation is my motorbike.
